title: Toolbar
description: Styling and formatting of text within an interface.

title.title: title
title.description: A <div> or <span> that will be used as the title text.

actionItems.title: actionItems
actionItems.description: A number of <cv-icon-button> elements to use for action icons on the right side.

navigationIcon.title: navigationIcon
navigationIcon.description: One <cv-icon-button> element to use for the left icon.

default.title: default
default.description: Scrollable content to display under the bar. This may be the entire application.

dense.description: Makes the bar a little smaller for higher density applications.

centerTitle.description: Centers the title horizontally. Only meant to be used with 0 or 1 actionItems.

prominent.description: Makes the bar much taller, can be combined with dense.

scrollTarget.description: Element used to listen for scroll events. (Type: HTMLElement | Window)
